field.name: description
field.value:
AR Tests: * AbstractModelTestCase.InitFramework() should probably be automatically initialized with the model assembly name. * Default namespace should be the same as the project name. * You get errors trying to use the test for more than one fixture, since you can only instantiate AR once. Should only call it once or set the init flag there.
General: * NHibernate seems to be added twice to VS' Add Reference tool box, both under for 1.1
MonoRail: * Suggestion: Add AR integration - by which I mean adding all the AR config, AR Support, Init of App_Start
